verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Worthy is the, Lamb who was slain. newline Holy, holy is he newline Sing a new song to Him who sits on Heaven's Mercy Seat.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Holy, Holy Holy is the Lord, God Almighty. newline Who was and is and is to come. newline With all creation I sing, "Priase to the King of Kings" newline You are my everything. And I will adore you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Clothed in rainbows, of living color. newline Flashes of lightening, rolls of thunder. newline Blessing and Honor. strength and glory and power be newline To you, the only wise king.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Filled with wonder, awestruck wonder, newline at the mention of your name. newline Jesus, Your name is power, newline breath and living water. newline Such a marvelous mystery.
